name: Each-uisge
description:
There is an old adage: When you hear hoofbeats, think horses. However that piece of advice does not always hold true.

A fantasy/light horror Scottish folklore based tale.

This interactive fiction piece was made for IFComp 2019.  It is currently the same build as the competition entry,  any future updates to the story will be listed as they are uploaded.

The screen and text colour can be changed via the settings button in game if desired.
